metadata.name: JOKER'S GOTHAM #1/9
metadata.description: The Joker is a character that culminated in The Dark Night and left a lasting impression. He was portrayed by Heath Ledger, who carried the Joker character to the top. The Joker turns Gotham City upside down. In this work, which is about all the crimes and events he has committed, the Joker is depicted on a checkered background.
